overview: Greg was President and CFO of Cyence International Inc., acquired by Filogix in 2008. He brings his experience in evolving a business from an entrepreneurial start-up to an industry leader in its domain. Prior to joining Cyence, Greg served as Vice President of Investment Banking for CIT and prior to that, as a Senior Accountant at KPMG. Greg is currently a member of the Equipment Leasing and Finance Association’s Future Leasing Leaders Network. A Chartered Accountant, Greg also holds a Bachelor of Mathematics and a Masters in Accounting from the University of Waterloo.
